content.description:
The reaction represented by the following equation has an equilibrium constant with a value of <math alttext="K sub 1" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mi>K</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>.

<math alttext="2 N 2, gas plus O 2, gas is in equilibrium with 2 N 2 O, gas, and K sub eq equal K sub 1" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <msub> <mrow> <mtext> N</mtext> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext>O</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>⇄</mo> <mn>2</mn> <msub> <mrow> <mtext> N</mtext> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mtext>O</mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mtext>        </mtext> <msub> <mi>K</mi> <mrow> <mi>e</mi> <mi>q</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>=</mo> <msub> <mi>K</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahGart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIYaGaaeiiai aab6eadaWgaaWcbaGaaGOmaaqabaGccaGGOaGaam4zaiaacMcacqGH RaWkcaqGpbWaaSbaaSqaaiaaikdaaeqaaOGaaiikaiaadEgacaGGPa GaeSiXHaOaaGOmaiaabccacaqGobWaaSbaaSqaaiaaikdaaeqaaOGa ae4taiaacIcacaWGNbGaaiykaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccaca qGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaam4samaaBaaaleaacaWGLbGaamyC aaqabaGccqGH9aqpcaWGlbWaaSbaaSqaaiaaigdaaeqaaaaa@563A@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
content.question: What is the value of the equilibrium constant, in terms of <math alttext="K sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, for the reaction <math alttext="4 N 2 O gas is in equilibrium with 4 N 2 gas plus 2 O 2 gas" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>4</mn> <mtext> </mtext> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>N</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mtext>O</mtext> <mo>(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo>)</mo> <mo>⇄</mo> <mn>4</mn> <msub> <mrow> <mtext> N</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mo>(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo>)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mn>2</mn> <msub> <mrow> <mtext> O</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mo>(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 1 over the square root of K sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 1 over the square of K sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
